articles.author: Billy Bambrough
articles.title: ‘Just The Beginning’—Bitcoin Suddenly Hits $70,000 Price ‘Tipping Point’ Amid Ethereum And XRP ETF Speculation - Forbes
articles.description: A legendary Silicon Valley venture capital investor has declared bitcoin is at a "tipping point"...
articles.content:
BitcoinBTC
 has rocketed over $70,000 per bitcoin, climbing toward fresh all-time highs as Wall Street quietly eyes a $90 trillion earthquake.
Subscribe now to Forbes' CryptoAsset & Blockchain … [+3605 chars]
